name: Milkbox Enduro
description:
Try not to blink to be the best! 

Milkbox Enduro is full of action and very addictive.  The objective of the game is to become the fastest milkbox driver in the world. Use power ups to get further and submit your score to rub in other playes' faces - to the victor go the spoils.

Find the milkboxer racer's tag on billboards , add it to your name and experience the most classic version of the game!
